shared.model.map

Class Road

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.map.Road

  • public class Road
extends java.lang.Object
    The Road is always on an Edge The road is located on a border between hex locations. The road's owner is identified by its color (which will match) These attributes will not change once the road is instantiated.
